author: maxb
msg: Merge r9861 from trunk to 1.0.x branch.
fixes reentrancy problem for javahl binding. The pool for a call could be
destroyed before the end of the call. This could crash the jvm
Also: SVNClient::fileContent retrieve file content from working if working

author: maxb
msg: Merge r10890 from trunk to 1.0.x branch.
Run external diff3 with full environment.

author: maxb
msg: to 1.0.x branch. Used patches provided by clkao, since direct svn merge
Backport Perl bindings fixes from the 1.1.x branch

author: maxb
msg: Merge r9883, r9905 from trunk to 1.0.x branch.
Fix for javahl binding. Avoid crashing when null is passed to various functions.
